messages.message: @andy following up here - are metrics available via API today?
yes but docs arenâ€™t released yet
They should be pretty similar to the old metrics endpoints though right? https://platform.instabase.com/docs/apis/metrics/index.html

There is new functionality related to AI Hub concerning:
1. Querying by a deployment ID
2. Deployment-level metrics
3. Review-level metrics
Haven't gotten around to creating a docs ticket yet but will prioritize it. The correct docs link is here: https://platform.instabase.com/docs/apis/v2-apis/automation-metrics/index.html

@david.lee All of the metrics in the linked documentation are used for AI Hub's automation metrics dashboard and can be filtered to a deployment by specifying a `deployment_id` instead of a `solution_name`
sweet, thanks elan. ya lets loop in the docs team to help here. and maybe we can even get SDK support for this too
